Ratusan Penumpang Sriwijaya Air Telantar di Bandara Makassar
07 Nov 2019, 09:05 by Moehammad Bakrie


Foto: Moehammad Bakrie/detikcom

Makassar - Ratusan penumpang Sriwijaya Air dengan berbagai tujuan telantar di Bandara Sultan Hasanuddin Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan. Pembatalan penerbangan itu, terjadi sejak kemarin. Sebanyak 6 penerbangan dibatalkan mulai dari tujuan Monokwari, Balikpapan, Timika, Cengkareng, Yogyakarta, dan Ternate. "Kami di sini sejak kemarin malam jam 11. Sampai sekarang belum ada kejelasan. Kami hanya disuruh untuk sabar dan menunggu. Sekarang malah dibilangnya batal. Kami kecewalah," kata seorang penumpang tujuan Monokwari, Muliati, Kamis (07/11/2019).Para penumpang mengaku kecewa karena tidak diberitahu oleh maskapai terlebih dahulu terkait pembatalan itu. Bahkan ada yang mengaku mendapatkan telepon dari Sriwijaya terkait pemberangkatan lebih awal."Saya malah ditelepon suruh datang jam 1 siang tadi, padahal jadwalnya jam 3 sore. Pas sampai di sini, dibilangnya batal. Bagaimana tidak kecewa. Mana ini tidak jelas juga apa masalahnya sehingga dibatalkan," kata seorang penumpang tujuan Balik Papan, Risma. Selain pembatalan penerbangan, para penumpang juga mengaku kecewa dengan proses pengembalian uang yang hanya boleh dilakukan di bandara tujuan. Mereka pun terpaksa harus mengeluarkan uang lagi untuk pembelian tiket baru."Masalahnya juga proses refund ini hanya boleh kita ambil di bandara tujuan. Iya kalau orang punya uang, kalau tidak bagaimana. Ini kan ada juga yang orang transit saja di sini. Mereka bingung mau ambil uang di mana lagi," lanjutnya.


Foto: Moehammad Bakrie/detikcom

Sementara itu, Airport Service Manager Sriwijaya Air, Arfian Yulizar Utama mengatakan, pembatalan itu dikarenakan adanya penghentian pelayanan pihak Gapura ke Sriwijaya sejak 6 sampai 7 November 2019. "Ini karena ada penghentian pelayanan dari Gapura. Kami juga tidak mau ambil risiko karena yang kita angkut inikan bukan barang saja. Makanya kami tidak mau melepas pesawat itu tanpa ada regulasi yang ada," katanya. Terkait kenapa pemutusan kontrak pelayanan dari Gapura ke Sriwijaya, Arfian mengaku tidak bisa mengeluarkan pernyataan apapun karena itu merupakan kewenangan manajemen pusat. Pihaknya pun hanya bisa menunggu keputusan dari pusat. Terkait hak penumpang, ia mengaku telah diberikan sesuai aturan."Kalau soal itu kewenangannya di pusat. Intinya kami hanya akan melayani penumpang dan kami telah berikan haknya sesuai ketentuan, mulai dari hotel sampai pada proses refund," sebutnya.Berikut penerbangan Sriwijaya Air yang dibatalkan di Bandara Hasanuddin Makassar mulai Rabu 6 hingga Kamis 7 November 2019.a. Hundreds of Sriwijaya Air Passengers Neglected at Makassar Airport
Nov 7 2019, 09:05 by Moehammad Bakrie


Photo: Moehammad Bakrie / detikcom

Makassar - Hundreds of Sriwijaya Air passengers with various destinations stranded at Sultan Hasanuddin Airport in Makassar, South Sulawesi. The flight cancellation happened yesterday. Six flights were canceled starting from destinations in Monokwari, Balikpapan, Timika, Cengkareng, Yogyakarta and Ternate. "We are here since yesterday night at 11. Until now there has been no clarity. We were only told to be patient and wait. Now it is said to be canceled. We were disappointed," said a passenger to Monokwari, Muliati, Thursday (11/07/2019). Passengers said they were disappointed because they were not notified by the airline in advance of the cancellation. Some even claimed to get a call from Sriwijaya related to an early departure. "I was even called to come at 1 this afternoon, even though the schedule was at 3 pm. When he got here, he said canceled. How not to be disappointed. Where is it not clear what the problem was so canceled, "said a passenger to the Balik Papan destination, Risma. In addition to flight cancellations, the passengers also claimed to be disappointed with the refund process which should only be done at the destination airport. They were forced to spend more money to buy new tickets. "The problem is that we can only take the refund process at the destination airport. Yes, if people have money, if not, there are also people who transit here. They are confused about wanting take money where else, "he continued.


Photo: Moehammad Bakrie / detikcom

Meanwhile, Sriwijaya Air Airport Service Manager, Arfian Yulizar Utama said the cancellation was due to the termination of the Gapura service to Sriwijaya from 6 to 7 November 2019. "This is because there is a termination of service from the Gapura. We also do not want to take risks because we are transporting "This isn't just an item. That's why we don't want to take off the plane without any regulations," he said. Regarding why the termination of the service contract from Gapura to Sriwijaya, Arfian claimed that he could not issue any statement because it was the authority of the central management. His party could only wait for a decision from the center. Regarding passenger rights, he claimed to have been given according to the rules. "If it is about that the authority is at the center. The point is we will only serve passengers and we have given their rights according to the provisions, starting from the hotel to the refund process," he said. at Makassar Hasanuddin Airport from Wednesday 6 to Thursday 7 November 2019.a.
